Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Quiz  
    ServerManager
    Interface to setup the Server Manager - that is the main port of contact
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientConnection  
    Player
    Since this class is to be used in the return value for the interface method, it must be declared to implement the Serializable interface (contained in package java.io ).
    PlayerClient
    PlayerClient is the connection file to the Server which allows a user to play quizzes java -Djava.security.policy=client.policy PlayerClient This file requests the IP and port of the serve to connect to On successful engagement with server - this file then loads up the PlayGame class
    PlayerScores
    PlayerScores class - these are individual scores for individual Quizzes.
    PlayGame  
    Question
    Creates a Question object which is then assigned to a particular quiz.
    QuizImpl
    Quiz class that create a quiz object and is saved in the ServerManagerImpl class Each Quiz is made up of a number of Question objects This class holds the quiz ID, Number of questions for this quiz, and Top Score
    ServerLauncher
    ServerLauncher class is the program required to launch the server so that clients can connect.
    ServerManagerImpl  
    SetUpClient
    This is the client class to load in order to setUp new Quizzes New Quizzes are given Ids that the player can locate on the server when using PLayerClient java -Djava.security.policy=client.policy SetUpClient
    SetUPMenu  
    TestQuizSetUp
